section.p: Helpless in the grip of the storm, the vessel cracks apart. The seawater rushes into the broken shell of the hull, dragging you down. The screams of your crewmen are drowned out by the howl of the storm.
Cross off your ship and crew. They are lost forever. You can think of nothing not but saving yourself.

.
If the score is greater than your Rank, you are drowned - .
If the score is less than or equal to your Rank, you are swept miraculously to the shore. Lose 2-12 Stamina points and (if you can survive that) .
